H0.text: What is the name of the large sandbank, located 62 miles off the coast of north east England in the North Sea. Longsand

H1.text: What is the name of the large sandbank, located 62 miles off the coast of north east England in the North Sea. Outer Dowsing

H2.text: What is the name of the large sandbank, located 62 miles off the coast of north east England in the North Sea. Indefatigable

H3.text: What is the name of the large sandbank, located 62 miles off the coast of north east England in the North Sea. Doggerbank

A4.text: Dogger Bank is a large sandbank in a shallow area of the North Sea about 100 kilometres (55 nautical miles) off the east coast of England.

A5.text: The name Dogger Bank was first recorded in the mid-17th century.
